alert.note: Alert for Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued June 05 at 6:38AM EDT until June 06 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding and splash-over around the time of high tide tonight. * WHERE...In Maine, Coastal York and Coastal Cumberland Counties. In New Hampshire, Coastal Rockingham County. * WHEN...From this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Seavey Island / Portsmouth NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.5 ft, Moderate 12.5 ft, Major 13.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.7 ft, Moderate 3.7 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/01 PM 9.4 0.6 1.2 5-6 None 06/02 AM 10.5 1.7 1.1 4 None 06/02 PM 9.3 0.5 1.1 3 None 07/02 AM 10.7 1.9 0.9 2 None 07/03 PM 9.4 0.6 1.1 1-2 None 08/03 AM 10.8 2.0 1.1 1 None Hampton Harbor NH MLLW Categories - Minor 11.0 ft, Moderate 12.0 ft, Major 13.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/01 PM 9.7 0.2 1.3 5-7 None 06/01 AM 10.7 1.2 0.9 4-5 Minor 06/02 PM 9.7 0.2 1.2 3 None 07/02 AM 10.9 1.4 0.9 1-2 None 07/03 PM 9.6 0.1 1.1 1 None 08/03 AM 11.0 1.5 1.1 0-1 Minor Portland ME MLLW Categories - Minor 12.0 ft, Moderate 13.0 ft, Major 14.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 05/01 PM 10.3 0.6 1.0 1 None 06/01 AM 11.8 2.1 0.7 1 None 06/02 PM 10.3 0.6 1.0 1 None 07/02 AM 11.8 2.1 0.8 1 None 07/02 PM 10.2 0.5 1.0 1 None 08/03 AM 11.8 2.1 1.0 1 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
